thought: To craft a yellow_bed, I need to first craft acacia_planks. To craft acacia_planks, I need to place a warped_stem in the crafting table. There is a warped_stem at slot 36, so I will move it to the crafting table (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1
